title: Gates Open & Welcome
description: Arrive, collect your colour powder, and find your spot!

title: Opening Ceremony & Welcome Address
description: Traditional lamp lighting and welcome by the festival organisers.

title: Bollywood Dance Performance
description: High-energy Bollywood dance by the local dance academy.

title: First Colour Throw!
description: The moment you've been waiting for — the first big colour throw! Get your powder ready!

title: Live Dhol Drumming
description: Feel the rhythm with live dhol drummers walking through the crowd.

title: Food & Cultural Stalls Break
description: Explore the food stalls, try henna art, and browse the cultural stalls.

title: Kids' Dance Workshop
description: Fun Bollywood dance session for kids and families.

title: Second Colour Throw!
description: Round two of colour celebrations — even more vibrant!

title: Live Music & Singing
description: Enjoy Bollywood and folk music performed live on the main stage.

title: Grand Finale Colour Throw
description: The biggest colour throw of the day! All colours fly together in a spectacular finale.

title: Closing & Thank You
description: Thank you to all attendees, volunteers, and sponsors. See you next year!
